summary: 'Ringers: Lord of the Fans' is a feature-length documentary that explores how "The Lord of the Rings" has influenced Western popular culture over the past 50 years.
cast: Dominic Monaghan|Elijah Wood|Peter Jackson|Viggo Mortensen|Orlando Bloom|David Carradine|Ian McKellen|Sean Astin|John Rhys-Davies|Billy Boyd|Clive Barker|Cliff Broadway|Andy Serkis|John Noble|Philippa Boyens|Barrie M. Osborne|Lemmy|Geddy Lee|Sala Baker|Forrest J. Ackerman|Peter S. Beagle|Brian Sibley|Michael Bilach|Marnie Boyd|Terry Brooks|Grecco Buratto|Christine Crawshaw|Cameron Crowe|Isabella Donato|Colleen Doran|Colin Duriez|Kent Elofson|Peter Genovese|Chris Gore|Guy Harrington|Shox Hincks|Adam Hurlbut|Brittany Ishibashi|Jymn Magon|Matt Mayhall|Bill Mumy|Selena Naumoff|Leonard Nimoy|Emeka Nnadi|Terry Pratchett|Michael Regina|Nicole R. Roberts|Justin Sewell|Keith Stern|Jill Thompson|Liv Tyler|John Welch
title: Ringers: Lord of the Fans
